string.value: The King's #b#p2041022##k is in need of help. What must it be? I better head over to #b#m220000400##k.

#p2041022# received an order to deliver the king's royal letter to #m221000000#. The problem is, he's hesitant to go, because to go to #m221000000#, he'll have to go through Eos Tower, and is afraid of descending down the Tower because of the spiders. Oh well, I'll have to kill off #r20 #o2230103#s#k #r20 #o2230104#s#k for #p2041022#. 

#o2230103# #r#a32451##k 
#o2230104# #r#a32452##k
I was able to eliminate #o2230103# and #o2230104#. I'm sure now #p2041022# can do his job. I thought #p2041022# was unafraid of anything else in life besides the King. Spiders? That was unexpected...

Hoh... what should I do? I can never go against his royal highness, but... the spiders... the spiders... hmmm... what? How can I help you? How can Tigun help you? \r\n#L0# #b You seem very concerned. What's going on?
What concern... I am the King's aide, and I should not be concerned about anything. It is really nothing... NOTHING. N.O.T.H.I.N.G... haha...\r\n#L0# #bYou seem pale. You're drenched in sweat...
What... what sweat? Oh... it's nothing. I am just concerned about how to best complete the King's order in a timely manner. Hmmm, you there... are you trustworthy?

If... if so, then ... can you help me out? A while ago, I received a word from his royal highness that I deliver his letter to #m221000000#, but... well... it is not easy to get there... you're aware that in order to go to #m221000000#, you have to go through Eos Tower, right?

Well,, the Eos Tower... is... full of spiders, right? What? Am I afraid of the spiders? Nonsense!! I am NOT afraid of the spiders. I am... just ... uncomfortable to be around them. If you can eliminate #r20 #o2230103#s#k and #r20 #o2230104#s#k at Eos Tower, then I will not have trouble completing the King's orders.
I cannot Say anything to a person who is not trustworthy. Hmm hmm...

Have you managed to eliminate #o2230103# and #o2230104#? Ohh, that's fantastic! Without them, going through Eos Tower is a piece of cake. Great work there. I will notify the King of your noble achievement.
I am definitely not afraid of the spiders. I just... dislike them. Every person has his or her share of dislikes in life.
You haven't eliminated the spiders? All you need to do is defeat #r20 #o2230103#s#k and #r20 #o2230104#s#k. This is to complete the King's order, so I expect you to do so in a timely manner.
